description:
Director of Deep Learning Research:

Seeking a hands-on Director of Deep Learning Research to join a cutting-edge AI company specializing in one-click image and video quality enhancement through the use of deep learning.

Trusted by over 1 million photographers and designers, including prestigious teams from globally renowned companies, we've processed over one billion images and achieved remarkable revenue growth within the past few years (and are on a trajectory for rocketship growth in the coming years).

As Director of Deep Learning Research, you will be at the forefront of defining the future in image and video enhancement. Your primary tasks will include managing and guiding a team of researchers to explore new deep learning models, solving complex imaging problems. Assessing customer feedback and analyzing image data to refine models based on real-world usage will also be essential.

Our technology has received coverage by leading media outlets, and we pride ourselves on our world-class team that's quick to execute, customer-focused, promotes from within, and operates on a highly profitable runway.

What we can offer a Director of Deep Learning Research:
• Make a profound impact at a high-growth tech software company
• Competitive base salary and annual bonus
• Full range of benefits - 100% covered medical/ dental/ vision
• 15 days annual PTO plus holidays
• 401k matching

Will compensate for relocation (with stipend upon offer) as we are a fully on-site team based in Dallas, TX!

Keywords: Deep Learning, R&D, Tensorflow, Pytorch, CNNs, GANs, computer vision, network architectures, image, video enhancement, photography, machine learning, AI, artifical intelligence, variational auto-encoders
